title: The Canadian shield: Saguenay region
creator_credit: Werner Aellen, Rene Jodoin and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: This film focuses on the Saguenay area of Quebvec as seen from a helicopter. From this vantage point, the size and resources - wood, water, arable land and mineral-bearing rock are easy to see. At closer range the film shows the industries and agricultural development of the region.
